lexUnit.name: girlfriend.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person's regular female companion in a romantic or sexual relationship

sentence.text: But the girlfriend of deputy manager John Onanuga leapt to his defence .
CHESHIRE housewife Tamara Kennerley , a girlfriend of Clinton when he was at Oxford , was among the first to offer her congratulations .
Alan had his own reasons for liking her desperate honesty ; reasons that went beyond his contempt for the other girlfriends of his youth .

Well unfortunately my girlfriend is dragging me off to Rhodes for a week so I 'll miss the Norwich , Scouse and Oldham game .
I think I 'm just gon na go round me girlfriend 's and sleep after she 's given me my food .

Last summer I split up with my girlfriend after five tumultuous but happy years .

A FATHER-to-be kicked and punched his pregnant girlfriend in a row .
A year ago Nicky , Rob 's girlfriend of about eight months convinced him to go back to the ice pack that nearly killed him .

Surely there are no irate girlfriends in your life any more ? "

You got a girlfriend ?

The startled youngster said : ` I have n't got a girlfriend , but I reckon I can afford one now .
